metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26846 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
SPIP before 3.2.14 and 4.x before 4.0.5 allows remote authenticated editors to execute arbitrary code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-26846` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

spip - 4.1.5+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spip package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.5+dfsg-1').
